text: The Low Millions are a pop-rock band from California. ==Discography== * Ex- Girlfriends (2004) ==Members== * Adam Cohen – vocals, guitar(singer/guitarist) * Michael Chaves – vocals, guitar * Jorgen Carlsson – vocals, bass * Erik Eldenius – drums ==References== * ==External links== * *Filter Magazine's Artists to Watch - Low Millions Category:American pop rock music groups
title: Low Millions
